description: AI-powered Visual Studio Code extension using Lollms OpenAI-compatible interface for smart coding, debugging, real-time enhancements, context management, and git commit message generation.

config.title: Lollms VS Coder Configuration
config.enableCodeActions.description: Enable the Lollms CodeLens actions (e.g., 'Lollms Actions...') above selected code.
config.enableInlineSuggestions.descripti: Enable single-line, inline code suggestions as you type (experimental).
config.disableSslVerification.descriptio: Disable SSL certificate verification for API requests. Use with caution for servers with self-signed certificates.
config.apiKey.description: API key for authenticating with the Lollms API.
config.apiUrl.description: URL of the Lollms API server (including protocol and port).
config.modelName.description: Name of the model to use
config.requestTimeout.description: The timeout in milliseconds for API requests. Increase this if long responses are timing out.
config.agentMaxRetries.description: The maximum number of times the AI agent will try to fix a failed task on its own before asking for user intervention.
config.chatSystemPrompt.description: The system prompt used for the normal chat mode. Defines the AI's persona, rules, and behavior. Supports placeholders like {{date}}.
config.agentSystemPrompt.description: The system prompt used for sub-agents in Agent Mode (e.g., the code generation agent). Defines the persona for autonomous tasks. Supports placeholders like {{date}}.
config.language.description: Influences the AI's response language. The extension UI follows VS Code's display language setting.

welcome.title: üëã Welcome to Lollms Chat! Here's what you can do:
welcome.item1: Ask me to write code, explain concepts, or debug issues.
welcome.item2: To create or update a file, ask me and I'll provide the full code. Look for the ‚öôÔ∏è Apply button to save the changes.
welcome.item3: Use the AI Context Files view in the sidebar to control which files I can see.
welcome.item4: Toggle ü§ñ Agent Mode to give me a complex objective. I'll create a plan and execute it step-by-step.
